entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:47 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -11.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 07:15 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -11.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -13.9°C
Wind: NNW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:25 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 06:25 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Snow mixed with rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 06:25 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
